name: Blue (itch) (Danielle)
description:
My first unity game, and first gamejam game ever. You play as "Blue", nicknamed for their blue eyes in a world where how richly colored your eyes are shows how emotionally and mentally healthy you are. Pull yourself out of a deep state, helped by your loved ones.
I may improve the game in the future, because getting COVID, and having to work another job ate up a lot of the time I wanted to spend working on this. Consider what this is a proof of concept.

Game made using the Corgi2d engine. Voices, music, and story done by myself.

AD to move, and Space to jump.
